1442280.name: Star Conflict - Starter Pack. Pterosaur
1442280.description:
Attention! Identical packs can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes:

  • Federation sabotage interceptor Pterosaur. Rank 3
  • Additional bonus of 50% to experience and credits for 50 battles
  • 3,000,000 credits

A special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle - Premium license for 7 days!

The new interceptor is based on one of the first developments of the company, namely Swift. As a result of many modifications, only the ship's hull remained the same. The main novelty is the modified plasma web. The “Wasp” plasma web is launched from close range at several enemy ships simultaneously. The updated engines have significantly reduced energy consumption for overcharge.
1442280.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 波兰语, 匈牙利语, 捷克语, 乌克兰语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
